title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
3 points are earned maximum

Identify the trophic levels of each of the organisms in the following food web.

Predict the effect on the ecosystem if the rabbits were removed and explain your prediction.

1 point—ldentify trophic level of each member of the food web (may label on diagram)

1 point—Valid prediction showing the effect of loss of rabbits on at least 2 members of the ecosystem

Increased population size of grass/mice

Decreased population size of coyote/owl/fungi

Mice decrease b/c owl and coyote will eat only mice

1 point—Explanation

Available energy is decreased for the owls and coyotes, resulting in lower survival and reproduction rate

Available energy is increased for mice resulting in higher survival and reproduction rate

Decreased herbivory allows the grass population to increase
